subject: [YouTrack, Commented] Issue codio-6464: Students that start units outside of a class should be warned
text:
Improvement was updated by Leo Iannacone in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 11:52.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6464 >codio-6464< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6464 > Students that start units outside of a class should be warned Created by Leo Iannacone  
When a student starts a unit outside of a class, he should be warned if he really wants to do this (in this case Teacher won't see that unit).                                                                            
This should only show if the user is a student in a class that also includes this same unit.

html:
Improvement was updated by Leo Iannacone in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 11:52.

codio-6464 Students that start units outside of a class should be warned Created by Leo Iannacone
When a student starts a unit outside of a class, he should be warned if he really wants to do this (in this case Teacher won't see that unit).

This should only show if the user is a student in a class that also includes this same unit.
https://github.com/codio/dashboard/pull/491
